summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Welcome to Apt Computing Labs. We offer training in Rust, system programming, Python, C, and C++. Join us to enhance your skills and work on live projects!

upcomingSessions.topics: Ownership, Borrowing, Concurrency, Error Handling, Traits, Lifetimes, Cargo, Crates, Modules, Testing, Documentation, Macros, Unsafe Code, FFI
Basics, Data Types, Operators, Control Structures, Functions, Arrays, Pointers, Strings, Structures, File Handling
OOP, Templates, STL, Exception Handling, File I/O, Multithreading, Smart Pointers, Lambda Expressions

gallery.description: Trainer: Kamal Kumar Mukiri (16 years S/W Industry Experience)
Rust is a systems programming language that runs blazingly fast, prevents segfaults, and guarantees thread safety.
